pluggable.name: Bricks
pluggable.author: Christian Gredig
pluggable.description: A plugin to use predefined and user-generated text bricks.

help.value: Usage: Enter brickname=brickvalue in one of the fields in the configuration. Brickname can contain a-Z, 0-9, underscores and dashes. Brickvalue can be anything. In post content, use {brickname} and it will be replaced with brickvalue automatically when the post is displayed. {i} is a predefined brick that inserts your current Habari base path so you can create internal links using {i}slug.
